reviews.text: I HAD FRIED CHICKE ALL OVER AND THIS IS THE WORST FRIED CHICKEN I EVER HAD.   I ORDERED THE 4 PIECE CHICKEN AND THE CHICKEN WAS ALL BONES AN BATTER.   I WAS THE WORST LUNCH I EVER HAD
Very pricey but food is really good

The fast food restaurant is located in the Dyker Heights section of Brooklyn.  Burgers, sandwiches, combinations, snacks, desserts and beverages are available.  I ordered the burger combination with french fries and choice of beverage.  The chicken tenders can include several amounts.  The ancient taro mud cakes were not flavorful.  The food was average in taste.
Fried chicken was alright

Moonflower house qis very bad place! I go to this restaurant and is disaster from start to finish. I slipped and fall on floor, no wet sign, nothing! My back is hurt very much now. And then, the food! Oh my God, the food! I eat it and now I have very big food poisoning. I was sick all night, throwing up everything. This place is dangerous and the food is poison! I telling everyone to stay away. They should be closed down for hurting people! This is not good place to eat, very bad, very, very bad.

I got their combo 1b, fries and boba. The spicy chicken sandwich was sooo good and so was the boba. They're super nice too and atmosphere is üëåüëålovely. Order here for quick, delicious and actually decently priced food!
I went two times and was disappointed two times. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend their food. I think their storefront is cute

Of all the fried chicken served in this 5 block area this place has the cleanest tasting fried chicken. The two Chinese restaurants across the street are just disgusting when you walk in and their fried chicken is kinda dirty. Not surprising since their fry oil have seen more use than this place.
Service is good. But you don‚Äôt interact much.
The atmosphere is nice. There‚Äôs WiFi so you can hang out here with a laptop. If they have coffee that would be nice. Just need something cheap and not franchise.
Lovely chicken sandwich and fries. Good price and nice place to sit. I will revisit.

I‚Äôve only gotten the fruit teas from this place and its pretty good especially since its $4.50, compared to other places thats pretty good. One of my gripes with this place is that there isn‚Äôt a consistency with the recipes. The first time I went there there was one employee working and the sweetness of the tea was perfect. But then the second time it was significantly sweeter and we ordered the same thing.

Also a lot of these reviews seem fake and unauthentic, sure the accounts are real but it seems like they‚Äôre asking ppl they know to leave reviews. At the moment for this I‚Äôll need to knock off one more star.
Clean store front with a wide range of food selection! Love their spicy chicken sandwich!
